author: Allen Rothermel
text: The City of Delaware, OH (population 34,700) is considering constructing a municipal fuel farm for its125 unleaded, 75 diesel and 50 off-road vehicle fleet.  Our preliminary design includes 2-20,000 gal. and one 10,000 gal. above ground tanks with four (4) dispensers.  For any communities having constructed such a facility in the past five (5) years, please provide cost information along with any comparative analysis with private fuel providers in your area to assist us in our decision-making.
title: Municipal Fuel Depot Construction
